A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm overall and after thinking really long about my decision on the sad side\, as an old fan and lover of theories\, this was just a slap in the face of all the fans\, it's okay to try new but to literaly overthrow this whole mystery over the shoulders and put an comedic merchandise comercial instead was just too much. The grafics tho are pretey and there was cool cgi fighting sceenes with ships and lightsabers and so on but it felt so soulless...
